title: RIOT! I have a question about the new Client
body:
Hey RIOT! Wondering what's the go on the new client? I saw the update on the Alpha update. 
( http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/client-update.html ) 

I would love to be able to try out the Alpha stage, and was wondering if there was a time of when we should expect it?

I also read about people who have a clean record on their accounts. Luckily for me, I have **NEVER** received a message from RIOT saying my account has been suspended/banned! :D

Any information about the new client is awesome to hear!

replies.body: The applications are gonna be so full ahah, I can see it now.
xD That's going to be so true

Look for signups to open before the alpha kicks off next year.

> We'll be posting more info **DURING** the 2016 season on the process for participating and testing the client update.
Cheers
Riot Mindstar

2016 Season hasn't even started yet. Prob wont be for a few months.

Technically, 2016 season started today with the 6.1 patch, ranked is still yet to reset (20th of Jan) 

I was seeing if they had any update on it xD

Thanks anyway!
